response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been highly valued by our previous customers. Given its exceptional quality and features, it's worth more than $120 to us. Considering its value to you, we're offering it at a special price of $140. This is an opportunity to acquire a high-quality item at a reasonable cost. If this meets your expectations, please let me know so we can proceed with the transaction.", "product_price": 140}
